name: music
description: ```     /package.json         npm run init-dev             安装全局&本地依赖         npm run init-dev-g           安装全局依赖         npm start                    启动 全部服务 ```

scripts.start: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Api,Music"  "cd NeteaseCloudMusicApi && node app" "cd webMusic && npm start"
scripts.init-dev: npm run init-dev-g && npm run init-api && npm run init-music
scripts.init-dev-g: npm i -g -d webpack webpack-dev-server concurrently typescript nodemon
